title: St. Abigail - Day 1
content:
In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Intro Prayer

St Abigail, I ask for your prayers in this novena, for healing of sickness, for growth in the virtues I need, and for peace in conflict. I also ask for a special intention in this novena (mention your request here…)

Concluding Prayer

St Abigail, you endured strife within your own family and yet remained faithful to our Lord. Pray for me, that I can be a peacemaker in my home and among those I love, for the glory of God and for the sake of souls.

Thank you in advance for the graces you are obtaining for me, and may I ever remain in a state of sanctifying grace, seeking God's will every day of my life. Amen.

Our Father
Hail Mary
Glory Be

Saint Abigail, Pray for us.
